parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the line; index begins at 0

title: IDatumTargetSym.IGetLineAtIndex
description: Gets information for the specified line.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the line; index begins at 0

remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles:
[
lineType, startPt[3], endPt[3]
]
where:
lineType
Line type as defined in
swLineTypes_e
startPt[3]
XYZ line start point
endPt[3]
XYZ line end point
